trans-unit.source: Convert a BizTalk map to a BizTalk Services Transform
trans-unit.target: Convert a BizTalk map to a BizTalk Services Transform

trans-unit.source: A command line tool that converts <token>btsBizTalkServerNoVersion</token> maps to <token>af_integration_full</token> <token>transform</token>s/maps.
trans-unit.target: A command line tool that converts <token>btsBizTalkServerNoVersion</token> maps to <token>af_integration_full</token> <token>transform</token>s/maps.

trans-unit.source: BizTalk Map Migration Tool
trans-unit.target: BizTalk Map Migration Tool

trans-unit.source: The <legacyBold>BizTalk Map Migration Tool</legacyBold> is available in the <embeddedLabel>Tools</embeddedLabel> package provided with the <token>af_integration</token> SDK and can be downloaded from <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=235057</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=235057</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: The <legacyBold>BizTalk Map Migration Tool</legacyBold> is available in the <embeddedLabel>Tools</embeddedLabel> package provided with the <token>af_integration</token> SDK and can be downloaded from <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=235057</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=235057</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: If an existing BizTalk environment contains maps and functoids, the <legacyBold>BTM Migration Tool</legacyBold> can help migrate these artifacts to a <token>msgflow_proj</token>.
trans-unit.target: If an existing BizTalk environment contains maps and functoids, the <legacyBold>BTM Migration Tool</legacyBold> can help migrate these artifacts to a <token>msgflow_proj</token>.

trans-unit.source: The <legacyBold>BTM Migration Tool</legacyBold> is a command line tool that uses the following parameters:
trans-unit.target: The <legacyBold>BTM Migration Tool</legacyBold> is a command line tool that uses the following parameters:

trans-unit.source: A BizTalk map (.btm)
trans-unit.target: A BizTalk map (.btm)

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: A resulting <token>msgflow_proj</token> <token>transform</token> (.trfm)
trans-unit.target: A resulting <token>msgflow_proj</token> <token>transform</token> (.trfm)

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: The following items must be installed on the same computer where you run the tool:
trans-unit.target: The following items must be installed on the same computer where you run the tool:

trans-unit.source: BizTalk Server 2010 or newer versions
trans-unit.target: BizTalk Server 2010 or newer versions

trans-unit.source: <token>af_integration_full</token> SDK
trans-unit.target: <token>af_integration_full</token> SDK

trans-unit.source: If the tools fails, confirm <token>af_integration_full</token> is listed at C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 12.0\Common7\IDE\Extensions\Microsoft.
trans-unit.target: If the tools fails, confirm <token>af_integration_full</token> is listed at C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 12.0\Common7\IDE\Extensions\Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: Usage

trans-unit.source: Copy the files and schemas associated with the BizTalk map (.btm) to the BtmToTrfmConvertor.exe folder.
trans-unit.target: Copy the files and schemas associated with the BizTalk map (.btm) to the BtmToTrfmConvertor.exe folder.

trans-unit.source: Open a command window and go to the BtmToTrfmConvertor.exe folder.
trans-unit.target: Open a command window and go to the BtmToTrfmConvertor.exe folder.

trans-unit.source: Enter the following syntax:
trans-unit.target: Enter the following syntax:

trans-unit.source: For example, enter the following:
trans-unit.target: For example, enter the following:

trans-unit.source: If you do not enter the output parameter, a .trfm file is created in the same directory and with the same name as the input .btm file.
trans-unit.target: If you do not enter the output parameter, a .trfm file is created in the same directory and with the same name as the input .btm file.

trans-unit.source: Limitations
trans-unit.target: Limitations

trans-unit.source: The BTM Migration Tool does not migrate all the functoids from the BizTalk Server map.
trans-unit.target: The BTM Migration Tool does not migrate all the functoids from the BizTalk Server map.

trans-unit.source: For a list of limitations and known issues with the tool, refer to the readme in the tools package.
trans-unit.target: For a list of limitations and known issues with the tool, refer to the readme in the tools package.
